name: Rotate & Roll
description:
Rotate and Roll is an addictive gravity driven game. Roll through these 72 challenging levels. Pick up the stars and roll to the bubble portal to escape from these bizarre worlds.


*** Instructions ***
Use your finger or tilt your device to rotate the world.
Collect all the stars and help the blobs find the bubble portal avoiding enemies and falling into outer space.

*** Features ***

- Four worlds and 72 levels
- Retina display support
- Multiple enemies and platform types.
- Game Center Leaderboard
- FUN

=)
